data.text: @taro_taylor Their excuses are fine, but made it worse for prohibiting staff from helping out the situation at public hospitals
@rysh5629 Yes, private but I think subsidised... they gave me a reason and it sort of make sense...There are other private hospitals that take covid patients though.

I asked the doc and he says to avoid cross infection, they have to make the hospital covid free so patients with severe and chronic illnesses can be attended to. It kinda makes sense but I still couldn't help but feel for those elderly queuing outside other hospitals...

@taro_taylor Private hospital? 
Yeah, they not care for the health of people, they care for their bank accounts
